entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
